exit.span: THIS IS A TERMINATE! DO NOT BACK UP AND CONTINUE ANSWERING. ALERT YOUR SUPERVISOR IMMEDIATELY!

samplesource.exit: Thank you for taking our survey. This is an over quota.
Thank you for taking our survey. Your efforts are greatly appreciated! THIS IS A COMPLETE.

block.label: Logistics

radio.label: Location
radio.title: Sample Source (web) / Location (web to clt)
radio.row: Oi Research- Online Interactive Research Limited

autofill.label: JobNumber
autofill.title: AE511 - EJ Gallo Flash.PDP Trial & Custom Model

text.label: LocationCode
text.title: This is used to assign each location's unique identifying code from the Location question row label. Do not edit.

block.note: Edit logic based on country - if one country, use "True", if multiple countries, assign based on sample company. Make sure field department knows to alert you if they are adding a sample company

html.label: Intro
html.p:
HELLO AND WELCOME TO OUR SURVEY!
THANK YOU IN ADVANCE FOR YOUR PARTICIPATION. THIS STUDY IS VERY IMPORTANT TO US AND WE ASK THAT YOU ANSWER EACH QUESTION CAREFULLY AND COMPLETELY.
WHILE GOING THROUGH THE SURVEY, PLEASE USE THE SCROLL BAR ON THE RIGHT AND BOTTOM OF YOUR SCREEN TO MOVE UP AND DOWN THROUGH QUESTIONS AND IMAGES. PLEASE REMEMBER THAT THERE ARE NO RIGHT OR WRONG ANSWERS. WE ARE ONLY INTERESTED IN YOUR OPINIONS.
THANK YOU AGAIN! LET’S BEGIN…

select.label: S_State
select.title: Please select the US state in which you currently live.

term.label: te1
term.cond: (S_State.AL or S_State.KY or S_State.MS or S_State.UT)

radio.label: S_Gender
radio.title: Please state your gender.

number.label: S_Age
number.title: Please type in your age below.

checkbox.label: S_Retailer
checkbox.title: In the past year, have you shopped at any of the following online retailers?

radio.label: S_Frequency
radio.title: How often did you purchase products from each of the following categories at [pipe: Retailer_Qualifier]?
radio.row: Pens, pencils, markers, or other writing utensils

autofill.label: FreqQual
autofill.title: Frequency Qualifier
autofill.row: Pens, pencils, markers, or other writing utensils
Salty snacks like potato or tortilla chips

checkbox.label: S_Wine
checkbox.title: Which types of wine did you purchase in the past year at [pipe: Retailer_Qualifier]?

checkbox.label: S_Brand_PastPurchased
checkbox.title: Please select all the brands of wine you bought in the past year at [pipe: Retailer_Qualifier]?

radio.label: S_BUMO
radio.title: Please select the one wine brand you bought most often in the past year at [pipe: Retailer_Qualifier]?

block.label: Quotas
block.exec: if PhaseQ.r1: Phase.val=0 if PhaseQ.r2: Phase.val=1 if PhaseQ.r3: Phase.val=2 if PhaseQ.r4: Phase.val=3 if PhaseQ.r5: Phase.val=4 if PhaseQ.r6: Phase.val=5 if PhaseQ.r7: Phase.val=6 if PhaseQ.r8: Phase.val=7 if PhaseQ.r9: Phase.val=8 if PhaseQ.r10: Phase.val=9 if PhaseQ.r11: Phase.val=10 if PhaseQ.r12: Phase.val=11 if PhaseQ.r13: Phase.val=12 if PhaseQ.r14: Phase.val=13 if PhaseQ.r15: Phase.val=14

radio.label: Phase
radio.title: Phase

block.label: AgreementBlock
block.note: THIS QUESTION SHOULD BE LEFT IN TO ENSURE QUALITY OF INTERVIEWING AND THAT IT'S NOT A BOT TAKING THE SURVEY

radio.label: RedHerringCheck
radio.title: Which of the following is not a color?

radio.label: Agreement
radio.title:
Congratulations! You qualify!Thank you for agreeing to participate in this consumer study on behalf of Behaviorally. Before you can participate in this research, we would like you to understand that it will involve products which may be confidential. By signing this agreement you agree as follows:
You will hold in confidence any information about the products or packaging that may be disclosed to you directly or indirectly by participating in this research.
You will use information disclosed to you only for the purpose of participating in this consumer study, and you will not otherwise use the information for your own benefit or the benefit of any third party.
GDPR Disclaimer:We take every reasonable precaution to ensure the privacy and security of your information during the market research survey.
At no time will the information you provided be used for any purpose other than research and you will in no way be adversely affected by taking part.
Behaviorally does not capture or store personal information, but merely logs the user’s IP address which is automatically recognized by the web server.
This information is destroyed 2 months after you have taken this survey.
You will be compensated for your time, commitment, and confidential obligation.
Please confirm your acceptance of these terms by checking the agreement below.

row.label: r1
row.b: I hereby acknowledge and agree to the terms.

text.label: DateTime
text.title: DateTime
text.exec:
from datetime import datetime
cur_time = datetime.now() DateTime.val = cur_time.strftime("%m/%d/%Y %H:%M:%S")

block.label: CarouselBlock
block.builder:title: PDP CAROUSEL IMAGES
block.html: Please imagine you’re shopping for wine online. We’ll show you a series of pictures and we would like you to look at them as you normally would while shopping online. As you look at each picture, swipe right if the product piques your interest or swipe left if it does not.

radio.label: Q99
radio.title:
Swipe right → for ‘I would buy this product’ and
swipe left ← for ‘I would not buy this product’
radio.col: I would not buy this product

block.html: Please imagine you’re shopping for wine online. We’ll show you a series of pictures and we would like you to look at them as you normally would while shopping online. As you look at each picture, swipe right if the product piques your interest or swipe left if it does not.

radio.label: Q_1
radio.title:
Swipe right → for ‘Piques my interest this product’ and
swipe left ← for ‘Does not pique my interest this product’

block.html: Please continue to imagine you’re shopping for wine online. We’ll show you a series of pictures and we would like you to look at them as you normally would while shopping online. As you look at each picture, swipe right if you would buy the product based on the image or swipe left if you would not buy it.

radio.label: Q_2
radio.title:
Swipe right → for ‘Buy this product’ and
swipe left ← for ‘Do not buy this product’

block.html: Please continue to imagine you’re shopping for wine online. We’ll show you a series of pictures and we would like you to look at them as you normally would while shopping online. As you look at each picture, swipe right if you can easily see the brand name, type of wine and size or swipe left if you cannot easily see the brand name, type of wine and size.

radio.label: Q_3
radio.title:
Swipe right → for ‘Can easily see the brand name, type of wine and size’ and
swipe left ← for ‘Cannot easily see the brand name, type of wine and size’

col.label: c1
col.b: Cannot easily see the brand name, type of wine and size

col.label: c2
col.b: Can easily see the brand name, type of wine and size

block.html: Please imagine you’re shopping for wine online. We’ll show you a series of pictures and we would like you to look at them as you normally would while shopping online. As you look at each picture, swipe right if the picture inspires you to try the product or swipe left if it does not.

radio.label: Q_4
radio.title:
Swipe right → for ‘Inspires you to try this product’ and
swipe left ← for ‘Does not inspire you to try this product’

col.label: c1
col.b: Does not inspire you to try this product

col.label: c2
col.b: Inspires you to try this product

block.html: Please continue to imagine you’re shopping for wine online. We’ll show you a series of pictures and we would like you to look at them as you normally would while shopping online. As you look at each picture, swipe right if the picture helps you understand what you are buying, or swipe left if it does not help you understand what you are buying.

radio.label: Q_5
radio.title:
Swipe right → for ‘Helps you understand what you are buying’ and
swipe left ← for ‘Does not help you understand what you are buying’

col.label: c1
col.b: Does not help you understand what you are buying

col.label: c2
col.b: Helps you understand what you are buying

block.html: Please continue to imagine you’re shopping for wine online. We’ll show you a series of pictures and we would like you to look at them as you normally would while shopping online. As you look at each picture, swipe right if you think the product would taste great based on the image or swipe left if you do not think it would taste great.

radio.label: Q_6
radio.title:
Swipe right → for ‘Would taste great ’ and
swipe left ← for ‘Would not taste great ’

block.html: Please imagine you’re shopping for pens, pencils, markers, or writing utensils online. We’ll show you a series of pictures and we would like you to look at them as you normally would while shopping online. As you look at each picture, swipe right if you think the product can be used for a variety of occasions or swipe left if you do not think it can be used for a variety of occasions.

radio.label: Q_7
radio.title:
Swipe right → for ‘Can be used for a variety of occasions’ and
swipe left ← for ‘Not for a variety of occasions’
radio.col: Not for a variety of occasions
Can be used for a variety of occasions

block.html: Please continue to imagine you’re shopping for pens, pencils, markers, or writing utensils online. We’ll show you a series of pictures and we would like you to look at them as you normally would while shopping online. As you look at each picture, swipe right if you think you can take these products anywhere, or swipe left if you don’t think you can take them anywhere.

radio.label: Q_8
radio.title:
Swipe right → for ‘I can take them anywhere’ and
swipe left ← for ‘I can’t take them anywhere’

block.html: Please continue to imagine you’re shopping for pens, pencils, markers, or writing utensils online. We’ll show you a series of pictures and we would like you to look at them as you normally would while shopping online. As you look at each picture, swipe right if you think the product would be comfortable to use or swipe left if you do not think it would be comfortable to use.

radio.label: Q_9
radio.title:
Swipe right → for ‘Would be comfortable to use’ and
swipe left ← for ‘Would not be comfortable to use’
radio.col: Would not be comfortable to use

radio.title: SKU1 - Image #
